name: Never Ending Rat-Race
description:
In this digitalized society, I've always been questioning whether a degree of a certain education still relevant to the needs of people. Indeed, for Doctors, medical staffs, educators they do need some qualifications. But for myself, I believe I don't need one. My graduation will come very soon. I am an art student. I study to become an artist, but after studying for almost 4 years. I still found zero clue, on how to become an artist. I believe that the system/curriculum itself wasn't made by an artist or a true art practitioner in field. 

I will not let myself step into another rat-race. My whole life has been a rat-race, formal education is part of it. Graduating, only to expect for a safe job, is my biggest fear. While everyone safely walks towards the same direction, I will walk to the other direction, to the unknown, to the uncertainty. I believe that not every uncertainty, is a bad uncertainty. There must also be a great uncertainty that needs to be discovered, stepping out of the racetrack will be my first move after my graduation, this year.
